visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts bar chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bar, Chart title: 'Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be the names of professions, Y-axis labels should be percentages with a '%' suffix, Data series: Two series, 'Men' and 'Women', with corresponding data, Custom colors: Use specific border colors for each series, Additional configurations: Include accessibility settings, tooltip formatting, and stacking the bars by percentage.

title.text: Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a bar chart that visualizes the gender distribution in the top 10 professions in Sweden for individuals aged 16-64 in 2017. The chart is of type 'bar' and includes a title and subtitle for context. The X-axis displays the names of professions, while the Y-axis represents the percentage of gender distribution, formatted to show percentages with a '%' suffix. The chart includes two data series: 'Men' and 'Women', each with specific data points and border colors for visual distinction. The bars are stacked by percentage to easily compare the gender distribution within each profession. Additional configurations include accessibility settings for better usability, a tooltip that displays the percentage of each gender in a profession, and styling for the tooltip background and border. The chart is designed to be informative and accessible, providing a clear visual representation of the data.
